contentencoded: In spite of typically slower summer months, analysts are watching today's meeting of the Fed and wondering what the content of the forthcoming announcement will signal. Plus, the white house is arguing that global warming needs to be addressed for both the environment and the economy. More on that report. Plus, as tech companies get larger, so do their voices. More on a new crop of tech lobbyists who are hoping to shape policy.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday July 29, 2014
teaser: The Fed's summer meeting, the global warming economy, and tech lobbyists.
description: The Fed's summer meeting, the global warming economy, and tech lobbyists.
title: PODCAST: Lobbying for tech
